## Result of irb_info

ex.)

```
irb(main):001:0> irb_info
=>
Ruby version: 3.0.0
IRB version: irb 1.2.7 (2020-09-19)
InputMethod: ReidlineInputMethod with Reline 0.1.9 and /home/aycabta/.inputrc
.irbrc path: /home/aycabta/.irbrc
```
